DeregistrationReasonOtherText: This facility has moved to a new address

_desc.NAICS_DESCRIPTION: Other Chemical and Allied Products Wholesalers

_exec_summary.SummaryText: nexAir, LLC is a distributior of industrial and medical gases and has been in business in Pineville, LA since April of 2000. nexAir, LLC acquired this facility from Greene Welding Supply and the purchase became effective April of 2000. Prior to the date of of purchase this facility was, owned by, and doing business as Greene Welding Supply. nexAir, LLC is dedicated to protecting the health and safety of it's employees and the public while complying with all applicable laws and regulations. The only regulated chemical stored at this facility is Chlorine gas. It is stored in 150 lb cylinders. The primary distribution / sales for this gas is to water well facilities in the Pineville locale. The worst case scenario is the release of one 150 lb cylinder of chlorine in a 10 minute period. Toxic Endpoint for this type release is .4 miles. The alternate release scenario is the release of one 150 lb cylinder of chlorine over an 8 hour period from a .1 square inch hole. Usingthis type scenario, a greater likelyhood would be that a chlorine cylinder would develop a leak at the valve and slowly leak down over an extended period of time. The Toxid Endpoint for an alternate release scenario is .1miles. In the event of a Reportable Release, the Pineville Fire Department will be notified to respond. The Rapides Parish Local Emergency Planning Committee would also be notified in order to inform the public and take precautionary measures to protect public safety.
